news.title: British couple freed after months in Taliban prison
news.summary: The family of Barbie, 76, and Peter Reynolds, 80, had feared they would die in detention as their health deteriorated.

news.title: US TV hosts back Kimmel as Trump threatens TV networks
news.summary: America's late-night TV hosts rally behind fellow comedian Jimmy Kimmel after he was suspended by ABC.

news.title: Minister rejects Trump's call for military to tackle illegal migration in UK
news.summary: Peter Kyle says the military is focused on key issues around the world and the UK Border Force has specific responsibility for policing borders.

news.title: US blocks UN call for Gaza ceasefire for sixth time
news.summary: Washington's representative says the Security Council resolution does not go far enough in condemning Hamas.

news.title: Spectacular autumn leaves expected after warm UK summer
news.summary: Experts are predicting a colourful autumn with red, orange and golden leaves in a vibrant display.

news.title: Premier League ticket black market exposed by BBC investigation
news.summary: Find out what happened when we tried to attend four Premier League games with tickets from "unauthorised" websites.

news.title: Migrant returned to France after government wins court challenge
news.summary: Eritrean man arrives in Paris under the "one in, one out" deal as at least three boats carrying migrants leave beaches in France.

news.title: New Troubles legacy deal 'a day and night improvement'
news.summary: Ireland's deputy prime minister says the new package will provide "maximum truth, justice and accountability" to victims.

news.title: Trump says he didn't want London Mayor Sadiq Khan at state banquet
news.summary: The mayor of London did not seek or expect an invite to the state banquet, the BBC understands.

news.title: Joy Crookes 'let go' of perfectionism - her music is better for it
news.summary: The singer says she avoided the second-album slump as she "has always got something to say".
